name: Peng Wars
description:
Plot

Peng Village, Antarctica is a peaceful place, where Pengs of all shapes and sizes live safe from the struggles of the rest of the world. Or they would, if it wasn't for their natural predators: the Seals, who are leading an attack on the Pengs to finish them off for good. Take the role of a Peng commander, and lead your Pengs to victory!

Controls

This game is entirely mouse-controlled. Click on the boxes in battle to summon your Pengs and perform other actions. Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out. Press F4 for fullscreen, and F2 and F3 to adjust the window size.

Gameplay

Save up fish to purchase Pengs, who'll walk forward and battle foes in their way. Spend fish on your Fisherpeng to have him fish up fish faster, giving you more income. Buy stronger Pengs to overpower your enemies. When the time is right, fire your Peng Base's missiles to land a decisive blow! Win the stage and earn EXP to unlock and upgrade your Peng Army!

Content

This demo includes:

  • 43 levels across 7 maps in the first chapter
  • 9 Pengs to collect and upgrade, with 2 extra ones to be used in future updates
  • 13 enemies to battle
  • At least one easter egg
